short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Carrier Lookup, Document AI Parsing, Load Management and Track and Trace powered by HaulHero CoPilot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HaulHero's AI-powered CoPilot is a Chrome Extension allows for Carrier Lookup, Document AI Parsing, Load Management and Track and Trace.

HaulHero provides multiple workflow automations to help you and your freight business. With HaulHero CoPilot, you can:
   - Lookup Carriers and get detailed information on them
   - Get your carrier's location with HaulHero's Track and Trace tool
   - Manage your loads and match capacity to your freight
   - Find new carriers to work with by matching your freight to nearby capacity
   - Upload documents and get a summary on the important parts

Note: A HaulHero account is required to use this extension.

If you have questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to email us at hello@gohaulhero.com
